Html:
I have run into a problem when setting the Position property on MapControl in WPF. If you change the position a small amount from the current position, the map does not update, but markers do. You can reproduce this problem in the WPF demo application. If you change the position in the "coordinates" box a small amount (i.e. change the initial longitude from 25.2985095977783 to 25.2995095977783) and click the "Go To!" button, the map does not change, but the markers move to the correct position. If you then click the "Reload" button, the map is updated properly.

Thank you for this great library.
